Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, I'll stop boring you. <sp:5:0:0>But if you
happen to get your hands on a <clr:0000>weapon
made with Lynel horn<clr:ffff>, bring it my way.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A Lynel is a huge, hooved beast that
walks on four legs.<sp:0:4:0>There are several variations. Eyewitnesses
have reported seeing Lynels with red
manes, <sp:5:0:0>blue manes, <sp:5:0:0>and white manes.
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I once saw one from far away. It was a
terrifying sight, I'll tell you that much.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You won't have to travel far. I saw one
just north of here, <clr:0000>near the entrance to
Tempest Gulch<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>I didn't get a close look, but there's no
doubt that towering monster<sp:5:0:0> was a Lynel.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Very, very carefully! <sp:5:1:0>Lynels have four
agile legs, but they've also got two big,
muscular arms to pummel you with.
As if that wasn't enough, they can also
fling fireballs from a distance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Fighting them head-on is a recipe for
a very, VERY bad time.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>If you <clr:0000>rode on its back<clr:ffff> though... <sp:5:1:0>That
might be a different story.<sp:0:4:0>The trick would be <clr:0000>hitting the Lynel's
weak spot <clr:ffff>so that it gets low enough for
you to climb on top.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If there's anything else you want to hear
about Lynels, just ask. I'm an open book.<sp:5:1:0>

I can tell you what they look like, <sp:5:1:0>where to
find them, <sp:5:1:0>and even how to fight them.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Hey, that weapon you're holding!<sp:5:1:0>
Let me see it!
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm. Well, if you ever change your mind,
there's a reward in it for you.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So... <sp:5:1:0>Are you going to show me that
weapon now?
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>That's...<sp:5:1:0> No doubt about it... <sp:5:0:0>That's a
<clr:0000>weapon made with Lynel horn<clr:ffff>!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>And it's the horn of a Blue-Maned Lynel!
How'd you manage that?
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>And it's the horn of a White-Maned Lynel!
How'd you manage that?
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>And it's the horn of a Silver Lynel!
How'd you manage that?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Painful_00>I'm in a hurry here, if you don't mind.
Got to get somewhere dry.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hm!<sp:5:1:0> That's an unusual weapon you have
there.<sp:5:0:0> Where did you get it?
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Nice and sharp too... <sp:5:1:0>You could slice
through anything with this baby.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>That settles it. This is the strongest
weapon in the world!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm honored that I got to see such a
stunning weapon up close. Here.<sp:5:0:0> It's the
least I owe you.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I get the sense you're a swordsman.<sp:5:1:0>
You interested in weapons?
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Then again, the world's a big place.
Who knows? Maybe a stronger weapon
is out there somewhere.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Someday I'll return the favor and show
you a weapon of my own making!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>No kidding? <sp:5:0:0>I make weapons too. I've
been using all sorts of materials, trying to
make the <clr:0000>strongest weapon in the world<clr:ffff>!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Nice and hard too... <sp:5:1:0>You could shatter
anything with this baby.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>That settles it.<sp:5:0:0> This is the strongest
weapon in the world!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm honored that I got to see such a
stunning weapon up close. Here.<sp:5:0:0> It's the
least I owe you.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>No kidding!<sp:5:0:0> Who from? It's an excellent
piece of work.<sp:0:4:0>I actually make weapons myself. I've been
using all sorts of materials, trying to make
the <clr:0000>strongest weapon in the world<clr:ffff>!
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You want to know more?


I can tell you what Lynels look like,<sp:5:1:0>
where to find them, <sp:5:1:0>and even how to
fight them.<sp:5:1:0> Just ask.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Of course. What swordsman doesn't?
Well, you wouldn't happen to know how
to make them, would you?
I make weapons, see. I've been using all
sorts of materials, trying to make the
<clr:0000>strongest weapon in the world<clr:ffff>!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>Didn't I just... <sp:5:1:0>Well, no matter.<sp:5:1:0> You can
never be too careful.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Tell me something. You ever heard of the
monster they call a <clr:0000>Lynel<clr:ffff>?
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>You want to go in prepared, rather than
relying on strength alone. That's the mark
of a true swordsman.
Ask away. I can tell you about what Lynels
look like,<sp:5:1:0> where to find them, <sp:5:1:0>and how to
fight them.
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Practicing your sword technique is
important, but so is knowing your enemy.

That's where I come in. I can tell you
what Lynels look like, <sp:5:1:0>where to find them,<sp:5:1:0>
and even how to fight them.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's a huge beast with a body like a horse.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You wouldn't believe how many times
I've seen someone try to <clr:0000>ride on a
Lynel's back<clr:ffff> only to go flying.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0500>I actually spotted one of their kind
northwest of here, <clr:0000>near the entrance
to Tempest Gulch<clr:ffff>.
But I wasn't about to pick a fight with a
monster like that. Strong, agile... And did
I mention they can shoot fireballs?
The best I could do was turn tail before
it caught sight of me.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh? I can't see it too well from down
here. Mind getting off your horse?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>A swordsman who doesn't care about
weapons? Now I've seen it all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I make weapons. I've been using all
sorts of materials, trying to make the
<clr:0000>strongest weapon in the world<clr:ffff>!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If I could only get ahold of that
<clr:0000>Lynel's horn<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I'm sure I could make the strongest
weapon in the world!<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Painful_00>But I'm no fool. <sp:5:1:0>I know I haven't got the
skill to take down a Lynel.<sp:0:4:0>Hmph.<sp:5:0:0> I just wish someone else would
make the weapon of my dreams and show
it to me. I'd give them a nice reward.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>So? <sp:5:0:0>How's it going? <sp:5:0:0>Made any new
weapons lately?
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I think with a <clr:0000>Lynel horn<clr:ffff>, you could make
the strongest weapon in the world...<sp:0:4:0>But of course, you can't just charge up to
a Lynel and expect to survive.<sp:5:1:0> You have to
be careful.
A sword's not enough on its own. You
have to be armed with knowledge too.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>That's why I've tried to learn all I can
about Lynelsâ€”<sp:5:1:0>what they look like,<sp:5:1:0> where
to find them, <sp:5:1:0>and how to fight them.
